ADVICE_10_BODYTEXT.message: Relocating to another faction might be a good idea when in trouble with local authorities.

ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.description: Point made is: the real illegal goods traders are fix to each station, but police's fake illegal goods traders will be random every time.
ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.message: As you return to a station, be weary of those alternative market places you do not recognize, and you will stay out of trouble with the law.

ADVICE_2_BODYTEXT.message: Many small distances are faster travelled than their sum.

ADVICE_2_HEADLINE.description: (A reference to the famous poem The Road Not Taken, by Robert Frost)

ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.description: (it simply says, to have enough fuel to leave a place where there is no possibility to refuel)
ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.message: Avoid jumping into uninhabited systems without the means to leave.

ADVICE_3_HEADLINE.message: Avoid getting stranded: plan your jump sequence ahead

ADVICE_4_BODYTEXT.message: Choose your frame of reference. Especially when wanting to match speed and course of a moving target.

ADVICE_6_BODYTEXT.message: Pay close attention to any news reported, as information can affect market prices.

ADVICE_6_HEADLINE.message: Keep your ear to the ground

ADVICE_7_BODYTEXT.message: Donations can earn you a good standing in society, but not all charities will earn you a reputation.

ADVICE_8_BODYTEXT.message: When journeying to binary systems, make sure to target the right star.

ADVICE_9_BODYTEXT.message: Regularly maintain your engines, but remember: you get what you pay for.

TALE_1_BODYTEXT.message: Don't miss the beautiful eclipse on New Hope as Hades blocks out the light from Epsilon Eridani.

TALE_1_HEADLINE.message: "I've seen things you people wouldn't believe"
